title: AI/ML Engineer

growth_trend.explain: Rapidly increasing demand due to widespread AI adoption across industries, from healthcare to finance to autonomous vehicles.

description: Design and implement machine learning models and AI systems to solve complex business problems.
education_requirements: Bachelor's in Computer Science, Data Science, or related field. Master's preferred.

title: Frontend Developer

growth_trend.explain: Strong growth driven by increasing focus on user experience and the rise of mobile-first web applications.

description: Create engaging user interfaces and experiences for web applications using modern frameworks and technologies.
education_requirements: Bachelor's in Computer Science, Web Development, or equivalent experience.

title: DevOps Engineer

growth_trend.explain: High demand as companies adopt cloud infrastructure and need to streamline deployment and operations.

description: Bridge development and operations teams to improve deployment frequency and reduce failure rates.
education_requirements: Bachelor's in Computer Science, IT, or related field. Certifications highly valued.

title: Product Manager

growth_trend.explain: Steady growth as companies recognize the importance of product-led growth and user-centric development.

description: Guide product development from conception to launch, working with cross-functional teams to deliver value to customers.
education_requirements: Bachelor's in Business, Engineering, or related field. MBA often preferred.

title: Data Analyst

growth_trend.explain: Growing demand as organizations increasingly rely on data-driven decision making across all departments.

description: Collect, process, and analyze data to help organizations make informed business decisions.
education_requirements: Bachelor's in Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, or related field.

title: Cybersecurity Specialist

growth_trend.explain: Exceptional growth driven by increasing cyber threats and regulatory compliance requirements across all industries.

description: Protect organizations from cyber threats by implementing security measures and responding to security incidents.
education_requirements: Bachelor's in Cybersecurity, Computer Science, or IT. Security certifications essential.

title: UX/UI Designer

growth_trend.explain: Strong growth as companies prioritize user experience to differentiate their products in competitive markets.

description: Design intuitive and engaging user experiences for digital products through research, prototyping, and testing.
education_requirements: Bachelor's in Design, HCI, Psychology, or related field. Strong portfolio essential.

title: Cloud Solutions Architect

growth_trend.explain: High demand as organizations migrate to cloud infrastructure and need experts to design scalable, secure solutions.

description: Design and implement cloud-based solutions that meet business requirements while optimizing for performance and cost.
education_requirements: Bachelor's in Computer Science or Engineering. Cloud certifications highly valued.
